casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tommie Earl MYLES. No. 41A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 29, 2008. Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Myles. Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 654 S.E.2d 752.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of January 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of January 2008."
